introduction: SYNOPSISOh Mi-young is a college student in deep poverty. To take care of her family, Mi-young first tells her boyfriend, Jin-su, of her intention and becomes a hostess. Through Dae-sun's persistence kindness and interest, Mi-young ends up living with him. When Mi-young finds out that Dae-sun's wife is a fellow student, Mi-young leaves him. Mi-young goes to a high-class kisaeng house in Daegu. She meets Kwon Yong-su there and gets implicated in a series of events. On the other hand, Jin-su asks Mi-young to start anew. However, she is unable to accept. Mi-young tells Jin-su of her situation and then leaves him.故事哦Miyoung sidalrimyeo贫困上大学是女主人的她的情人后精髓照顾家宣布他的决定。顽强的求生意志选举珍妮青睐知道，总统选举和校友的妻子是头发。鳕鱼仙权Yongsu的珍妮肝脏被称为参与的一系列事件。其实质是对珍妮珍妮行动的权利人告诉他的立场不能接受它，离开他的身边的。
